data.text: Through here and straight on to Reactor 5.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You make it sound so simple...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Only 'cause it is.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That there's the reactor support pillar.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So, what's the plan?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: After plan E comes F, G, and then H!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Thought E was the last.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This here is Section F.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We cut through Section G and head for H.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: A cargo platform in H will get us closer to the reactor.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Biggs should be somewhere over there.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Looks like the sun's going down on Midgar...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Right. Double time!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We got a date with a reactor.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Emergency power supply confirmed. Disengaging locking mechanisms.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Okay! That's that.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Great job, Cloud!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: This is it. The cargo platform Biggs was talking about.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Let's not keep him waiting.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Error. Insufficient power.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: You're kidding me.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Needs three lights' worth, looks like.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: But that's...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: That's all of them, isn't it?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: All or nothing...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Let's regroup here if we get lost.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Remember the H-01 sign.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Right.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Lessee now... Closest light ought to be...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That one.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Mercy!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Wait... Cloud?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Where's Jessie and Wedge?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Report.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Topside's going nuts after some terrorists jumped off a train.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Nice and quiet here, though.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: So quiet I had no trouble securing your route into the reactor.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: You magnificent son of a bitch, bring it in!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So─where are the others?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Jessie got hurt and couldn't make it.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Bad?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Not so bad she couldn't rope in this guy.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Thanks for stepping up.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: It's a job.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Worked out pretty good, you picking that train you did.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: You can waltz right on into Sector 5.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: While Shinra scours Sector 4...
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: It's a bit of a squeeze, but it ought to get you where you need to go.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Little dark and foreboding for my taste...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Beggars can't be choosers.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Oh─and you'll be needing your grappling guns, of course.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: All set?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Ready to take on the world and then some!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Make sure everyone gets clear, okay?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Will do!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Okay, y'all. Keep these grappling guns close.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Secure 'em to your belt or whatever so you don't lose 'em.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When we're done, we'll be using these babies to get down safe.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: All of us.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Got it.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Section G's through here, huh?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This oughta open it.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: No good?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Needs power, I think.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That looks more like what we need.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Control room...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let's check it out.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Need to restore the power.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey. You see something over there?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This a switch for the lamp?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Maybe the gate didn't budge because there's not enough power to spare?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Gotta figure this out.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Doesn't look good...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think it works?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Error. Insufficient power.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Of course.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey guys, look at this.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Instructions for dealing with a power shortage.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Kill the lights, and we free up power for the gate and other stuff.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: "Sun lamps"... You think these are the plate suns?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: The closest thing we have to the real thing.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Gotta put out a sun just to open a gate huh?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: But if we go through with it, the grounders in Sector 4 will suffer...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Now or later─sun's going out for good when we blow the reactor.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That's true.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Let's go.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That's gotta be one. Man, look at the size of it.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: That a console I see near the top of that ladder? A, uh, pretty tall ladder too.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'll go.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Okay. We'll wait down here.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Next stop: Section G!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yep! And after that, Reactor 5!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Not again...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Great. I'm sure those things'll welcome us just as warmly as before.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Tell you what, the rot runs deep in this damn pizza.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You okay?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Going for that materia, weren't you?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So close, and yet so far.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, let's take a moment to get our bearings.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We're still in G, right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah. And to reach Mako Reactor 5, we need to go through Section H.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Okay.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Unfortunately, I didn't spot a connecting catwalk to Section H, did you?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Well, we could always do another lap.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Go for ten, why don'tcha.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: The only other route that I can think of would be...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Along the wall.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Up for giving it a try? It might not work out, but it's the only idea I've got.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's not a bad one.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: So we're shooting for those giant fans way over there? Okay. At least we've got a clear landmark to guide us.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, look! I think we can climb onto that pipe!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Sure seems that way.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Dammit.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey guys, uh...you know these fans are really loud and...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You chickening out?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hell no!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm just worried that your bony ass is gonna get blown off the side and shit─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Enough! We gotta keep moving!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: O-okay then! Follow me!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I feel no fear...yeah, no fear...no fear...no fear...no fear...no fear─little fear!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No worse than a windy day, huh?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: One with a tornado warning maybe.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Don't look at the fan! Whatever you do.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Right.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, what's that behind the fan over there?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Isn't that─
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey! Don't be a dumbass!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Tifa told you not to look at the fan!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Made it through in one piece.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Think that took a couple years off my life.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I-I mean, uh, not really! Couple seconds maybe. Three tops!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We stop it?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Switching ventilation system to maintenance mode.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Please complete the maintenance access procedure within the designated time limit.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Man, what are we even doing?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Error. Error. Maintenance access procedure not completed within time limit.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Reactivating ventilation system.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Does this control the fans?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Access denied. Ventilation system is currently active.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Access granted. Disengaging time lock.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Where could they be going...? Embarking on an adventure to find some treasure!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Ventilation system service mode active. Access maintenance terminal to complete procedure.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: This is summoning materia!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Wow...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: What kind of badass will pop outta this one?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We'll see.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That's one down.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Rerouting power. Please wait.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Only two more lights to go.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Reinitializing intrusion prevention system.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: "Intrusion prevention"?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Back online 'cause of us.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: No need to fret, y'all. A few rusty mechs ain't gonna keep us from reaching the reactor.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And that makes two lights down.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Meaning we've only got one left.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: The end's in sight, y'all!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Should be able to climb down from here.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: And that makes three. Enough to finally get our cargo platform moving.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Better be.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Okay! Let's head on back to the H-01 sign.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Auxiliary power supply confirmed. Reactivating cargo platform.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Cargo platform activated. Awaiting input.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: So long, underplate. I hate you too.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Wait─wasn't there some materia that caught your eye? You wanna go grab it?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You wanna go grab it?
You know...I think I do.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Nah. No time.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You know...I think I do.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Nah. No time.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Wonder what the reactor's like.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Dark. Dismal. A slaughterhouse where they butcher the planet.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Then there's the smell. The mako. Be ready for it.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Right...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Almost there.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Tifa?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
It's nothing.
Just thinking about the next step.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Didn't think I'd be this nervous.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Some things you never get used to.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Nothing but air below us.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Shut up and move.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Just don't look down, okay?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Easy for you to say.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Maybe no one uses that entrance.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm getting the feeling no one's come down here for a long time.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No "plate inspectors," huh.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: All these lamps... You'd think they'd be able to balance the load by now though.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Maybe. If the maintenance guys or whoever weren't playing hooky.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The lamps are important, but when you think how much mako it must take to keep them running...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Don't mind us, y'all─just passing through!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If only.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: No way to cross that.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gotta go where the catwalks take us.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: They busted?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Powered down, is my guess.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Lucky us, am I right? One less thing for us to worry about.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Filling the air that we gotta breathe with their shit.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Monsters sure seem to like it. What's up with that?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's like in the tunnels. They get twisted by the mako. But it all goes back to Shinra.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This path's no good now.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm sure there's another way to get there.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hm... Nothing we can do but search.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: And when we find it, we can finally snag that materia.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You know the best way to not get lost is to believe that you're not. Mind over matter.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Isn't that from one of Marlene's books?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yup, one of her favorites! Loves it when I read it to her before bedtime, doing all the voices.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: "Life in the Endless Maze," am I right? I remember.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Those ventilation fans?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Keeping the plate's air clean by pushing the smog into the slums.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Whole system's designed to make shit roll downhill faster.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Section H is just up ahead! Slow and steady, guys.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: And that's our objective?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: The cargo platform? Yeah, I'm pretty sure that's the one.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hear that, guys? It's the reactor calling us. Beckoning us, saying, "Bring it on, Avalanche."
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: "By the light of these magnificent lamps..."
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: "we shall lead our brothers and sisters of the undercity to a brighter future."
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Say what?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's from a speech President Shinra gave talking up the importance of the sun lamps.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Brighter future, my ass. Shinra's leading us down a one-way path to darkness and death.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Look! There's the switch.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Let's flip it and go.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Intruders detected. Engaging countermeasures.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Mid-range turrets, huh?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey, Cloud! Hang back while I deal with these pests.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Just made our lives a lot harder.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We restored power to more than just security, remember?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Looks like another dead end.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gonna need to keep looking for another way through.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Think back. Anybody see a connecting catwalk?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We can move this catwalk!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Heads up, y'all.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah! Lined it up perfect!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If there's no viable path, we'll just have to make one.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Which way to the next light?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If we can't make sense of this place we're gonna get lost.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Well at least we know where the big-ass things are.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This'll hold, right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That the Sector 4 slums down there?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Huh? You wanna check them out sometime? I can show you around.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We'll check them out now if we fall!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The power's on.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: What we got here? Another platform?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You think they'll miss those three plate suns?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I say the real sun's the only one we need.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: To hell with Shinra and their night-lights.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We're right back where we started.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hmm... Where was that last light again?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Almost done. It's a shame we had to wander around so much.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Well. No Stamps here to guide us. No Jessie or Wedge to back us up neither.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah... Speaking of which, what should we tell Biggs?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I don't want him to worry.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I hope that Jessie's injury isn't anything serious.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: The best thing you can do to speed her recovery is to kick Shinra ass in her stead.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I know. I know. And Cloud's gotta cover for Wedge too.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Thought you'd know this place by now.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We should look for the H-01 sign.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Um...was this the way to the cargo platform?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: So, uh...you ain't lost, right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Uhh, you takin' a detour? Well, aight then.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Where could they be going? Embarking on an adventure to find some treasure!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When do we link up with Biggs?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Soon enough, don't you worry.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: He knew we might be late, so he came up with a few ways to kill time.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We oughta reach him long before he dies of boredom.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And we're back at the cargo platform.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Get ready, Mako Reactor 5. We're coming.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Okay. Biggs should be waiting for us up ahead.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: He's probably worried sick about us.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Even after all that fighting, no one's coming for us?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: No need. This is Shinra's city. They probably have cameras everywhere.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Why didn't you say something sooner?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Way too late to bail now.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's like walking a tightrope. When you're on it, only two ways off.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Better keep my balance.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You'd be good at it.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I wonder.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Okay.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Um, weren't we here earlier?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I think we already checked this place out.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You lost?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Wait. We already used this platform.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You forget something?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hold up. We rode this thing before.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: But you knew that, right Cloud?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Huh? We're going back?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: If you've got shit to do then hurry up!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Needs three lights' worth of power.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gotta power down three lamps first.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: There's not enough power to get it moving.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Need to disable two more lights.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Two sun lamps are still drawing power.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Needs more power.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Alright, we only need to power down one more sun lamp.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: One more light and we'll be good to go.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Just gotta disable one more light, huh?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Error. Insufficient power.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Gotta power down a sun lamp first.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Error. Insufficient power.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Maybe if we turn off the light?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Error. Insufficient power.

data.text: We need to disable a lamp first.
